actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To further enhance flood control efforts along the Greenbrier River Basin in the State of West Virginia.
short_title: Greenbrier Basin Flood Control Act of 1997
subjects: Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Greenbrier Basin Flood Control Act of 1997 - Amends the Water Resources Development Act of 1996 to increase from $12 to $40 million the authorization of appropriations for a flood damage reduction program for the Greenbrier River Basin, West Virginia.

titles.title: Greenbrier Basin Flood Control Act of 1997
To further enhance flood control efforts along the Greenbrier River Basin in the State of West Virginia.
